Posts.Content: Ljackson_61 wrote: I had lumpectomy in 2012 and one lymph node removed. I have pain back through the shoulder blade on this side all the time. It never goes away. I had 6 chemo and 35 radiation treatments. Anyone else have this pain Surgery 5/26/2012 Lumpectomy: Left; Lymph node removal: Left, Sentinel Chemotherapy 7/16/2012 Taxotere (docetaxel) Radiation Therapy 12/2/2012 Breast, Lymph nodes Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Pain After Lumpectomy Ljackson_61 NATSGSG

Posts.Content: Feb 24, 2015 10:06PM Ljackson_61 wrote: mhenz, yes I have pain on lumpectomy side a lot. I also had one node removed that was positive. I have moved from area I used to live in so am trying to get established with a new oncologist. I don't know about anyone else but I am paranoid all the time because it does bother me so much. Ready to get a check up and some reassurance

Posts.Content: Feb 15, 2015 09:31PM Ljackson_61 wrote: Thanks for the information. I have very hard time sleeping. If I lay on left side it is very painful. I hope to see oncologist soon to see if he would know why this is happening
